text:
When you buy through our links, Insider may earn an affiliate commission. Learn more.

It's November 29, which means Cyber Monday is well underway. The big event is well known for its excellent online tech deals, and this year is already proving to be no different — we're seeing low prices on TVs, headphones, speakers, gaming accessories, and more.

We've rounded up some key details and buying advice related to the best Cyber Monday tech deals. We also highlighted some discounts you can take advantage of right now across different tech product categories. We'll be keeping track of deals throughout the sale, so be sure to check back throughout this Cyber Week.

Best Cyber Monday deals on robot vacuums

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Great Price iRobot Roomba i3+ EVO (3550) Robot Vacuum The i3+ usually costs considerably more than your average robot vacuum, but right now, you can save $50 off the street price. This is your chance to experience high-end features, such as self-emptying and a personalized cleaning schedule, at a reasonable price. $499.99 from Target Originally $549.99 Save 9%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Ecovacs Deebot T8 AIVI Robot Vacuum The Ecovacs Deebot Ozmo Pro Mopping System thoroughly cleans floors as opposed to pushing a wet cloth around. When paired with the Ecovacs Deebot Ozmo T8 AIVI Robot Vacuum, the two make easy work of time-consuming chores. It’s now $250 off at some retailers. $679.99 from Best Buy Originally $799.99 Save 15%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Lowest Price Bissell SpinWave Robot Vacuum The Bissell SpinWave Robot Vacuum picked up all the pet hair on carpet in our tests and has a great assortment of mop attachments and accessories. The company is also committed to helping homeless pets and helps them find loving homes. $399.99 from Amazon

iRobot Roomba 694 This robot vacuum can be automated to work around your home schedule, and also works with virtual assistants like Alexa and Google Home. It's not the most powerful Roomba, but it can handle hardwood floors, pet hair and short carpets without issue.

Ecovacs Robotics Deebot Ozmo T8+ If you're looking for an option that's more robot than vacuum, the Deebot Ozmo has you covered — it has both vacuum and mop capabilities and even empties its own bin by itself.

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Great Price iRobot Roomba s9+ Robot Vacuum The D-shaped iRobot Roomba s9+ Robot Vacuum did the best in our hardwood floor tests and features a self-emptying dustbin, impressive app that lets you set no-go zones, and large main brushes that pick up debris on the first pass. During Amazon's Prime Early Access Sale, it's at its lowest price ever. $999.00 from Amazon

Best Cyber Monday deals on smartwatches

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Apple Watch SE 2020 (40mm, GPS) The $230 price we're seeing for the Apple Watch SE in the 40mm option is one of the best deals we've seen so far, only bested by a price drop down to $220 back in November. $199.00 from Amazon Originally $279.00 Save 29%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 (40mm) The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 is the obvious choice for Android users looking for a comprehensive, quality, premium smartwatch experience. However, it's a shame that the ECG feature is limited specifically to Samsung phone owners. It's currently available for only $175, matching worthwhile deals we've seen in the past, and only a few dollars more than the all-time low. $174.99 from Amazon Originally $249.99 Save 30%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Classic (46mm) The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 is the obvious choice for Android users looking for a comprehensive smartwatch experience. However, it's a shame that the ECG feature is limited to Samsung phone owners. The 46mm is $40 off at Best Buy. $339.99 from Best Buy Originally $379.99 Save 11%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Best Price Fitbit Sense The Sense smartwatch has a ton of added features, focusing on heart health and stress management, giving you a more holistic look at your well-being. Now, enjoy a cool $125 off the regular price at several retailers. $174.00 from Amazon Originally $299.95 Save 42%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Great Price Fitbit Luxe The Fitbit Luxe is the company's latest fitness band that comes with a sleek design and advanced health features like stress management and the ability to measure heart rate variation. It's currently $30 off, a great bargain for the newest model. $99.99 from Kohl's Originally $129.99 Save 23%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Fitbit Charge 5 Maybe an Apple Watch is too much — but if you still want to track his fitness, then the Fitbit Charge 5 is an excellent option. Down to $130, the Charge 5 is a great and inexpensive fitness tracker. $109.95 from Best Buy Originally $149.95 Save 27%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Fitbit Inspire 2 The Inspire 2 provides the standard features of Fitbit in a discreet, slim design that's comfortable on the wrist. Currently down to $67, this is the best price we've seen for it in 2022. $66.49 from Amazon Originally $99.95 Save 33%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Garmin Fenix 6 Pro Solar Edition Garmin's top-of-the-line Fenix 6 is the apex of smartwatch design and is perfect for the avid outdoors person, no matter if they hike, run, bike, or do it all. The fact it's on sale for $250 off its normal price makes this one of the best Cyber Monday deals we've seen. $549.99 from Best Buy Originally $799.99 Save 31%

Garmin Instinct One of Garmin's most popular and affordable watches, the Instinct is designed to stand up to the elements and relies on multiple global navigation satellite systems while also monitoring your stress, activity, and heart rate.

Best Cyber Monday deals on TVs

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Samsung 65-inch QN90A Neo QLED 4K TV Samsung's QN90A is an impressive flagship 4K TV with incredible brightness, viewing angles, and speedy performance — but it can’t match the infinite contrast of an OLED. This $1,600 deal price is a steal in comparison to its usual cost of $1,900. $1,599.99 from Best Buy Originally $1,899.99 Save 16%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Great Price Hisense 60" Class A6G Series LED 4K UHD Smart Android TV The Hisense A6G is one of the most affordable 60-inch 4K TVs on the market, offering a big-picture experience for a budget-friendly price. We've tested it and love it for a budget 4K pick. The TV is sometimes on sale for just under $500, but right now it’s an even better value at just $400. $399.99 from Best Buy Originally $549.99 Save 27%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Sony A8H 65" UHD 4K TV This Sony OLED offers some of the best video quality you can buy, but it tends to be on the pricey side. The $1,000 deal at Best Buy takes care of that. $1,499.99 from Best Buy Originally $2,499.99 Save 40%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal LG 65-inch C1 OLED 4K TV LG’s C1 is one of the best 4K TVs you can buy. The OLED panel delivers incredible image quality with an infinite contrast ratio. Though there is a newer 2022 model, the C2, with a brighter screen, it's hard to beat the value you get with this $1,600 deal price. $1,696.99 from Amazon Originally $2,499.99 Save 32%

Best Cyber Monday deals on headphones

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Apple AirPods Max Apple's AirPods Max carry over all the features fans love about the AirPods Pro into a wireless over-ear headphone design. Their current $450 price is rare for most of 2022 so far. $449.00 from Amazon Originally $549.00 Save 18%

Beats Studio 3 Wireless Headphones The Beats Studio 3 Wireless are a great set of noise cancelling headphones, especially for iPhone users who think the AirPod Max are way too expensive.

Sony WH-1000XM4 Noise-Cancelling Headphones Sony's are the gold standard in wireless noise-canceling headphones. For a limited time, you can pick up a pair for just $248, one of the lowest prices we’ve ever seen on these recently-released headphones.

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Bose QuietComfort 45 The QuietComfort 45 have a refreshed design with improved noise cancelling and better battery life. The headphones are $50 off right now for Cyber Monday. $329.00 from Bose

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Bose QuietComfort Earbuds The Bose QuietComfort Earbuds are the best overall wireless noise cancelling earbuds you can buy with good sound and stellar noise cancellation. $80 off brings these to $200, making them a great deal. $179.00 from Best Buy Originally $279.00 Save 36%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Sony WF-1000XM4 The Sony WF-1000XM4 are best-in-class for sound quality and noise cancellation, but they're best suited for those willing to pay their high price. They do see some discounts throughout the year, but $198 is the best price we've seen for them all year. $198.00 from Amazon Originally $279.99 Save 29%

Apple Airpods (2nd Generation) Apple's 2nd-generation of AirPods are the company's cheapest and most basic model that feature a wired charging case.

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Apple AirPods Pro The Apple AirPods Pro look and sound better than previous-generation AirPods. Plus, they have noise cancellation built right into them and integrate perfectly with other Apple devices. Right now they're back down to $170, matching deals we've seen for them in the past. $169.99 from Amazon Originally $249.00 Save 32%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal JLab Audio JBuds Air The JLab Audio JBuds Air offer a nice design, are relatively comfortable, and sound pretty good too — and they're totally wireless. $40 isn’t the best deal we’ve seen, but they’re already so affordable, so if you need a simple, reliable pair of wireless earbuds that sound surprisingly good, pick these up now. $39.99 from Best Buy Originally $49.99 Save 20%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 The Galaxy Buds 2 deliver incredible sound and noise-canceling performance, but the app is limited to Android devices only. Currently they’re down to $100, which is one of the best prices we’ve seen all yea. $99.99 from Amazon Originally $149.99 Save 33%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Lightning Deal Jabra Elite 75t Jabra's Elite 75t offers active noise cancellation and comes with an included charging case. This Cyber Monday deal takes nearly $75 off the original price for multiple colors. $183.70 from Amazon

Jabra Elite 85t Wireless Earbuds The Jabra Elite 85T have high-end audio quality and noise-cancelling performance for a great price, and they're often discounted. They're our top pick for most people looking for a well-priced premium pair of noise-cancelling earbuds, and they work great on iPhone and Android devices.

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Beats by Dre Powerbeats Pro They see deals pretty regularly throughout the year, and 20% off is on par with what we normally see. $199.95 from Amazon Originally $249.95 Save 20%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Beats Studio Buds The Beats Studio Buds offer great sound, an excellent fit, and decent noise cancellation. They support instant pairing for both iPhone and Android users, but the iPhone experience is still more seamless. Right now, you can get $50 off the red color variant. $99.99 from Best Buy Originally $149.99 Save 33%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Beats Solo Pro If you’re a fan of the vibrant light blue these Solo Pro headphones come in, this is a nice price for a brand new pair. Down to just $99, this is officially a steal. $199.99 from Amazon Originally $299.95 Save 33%

Best Cyber Monday gaming deals

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Great Price Nintendo Switch Ring Fit Adventure Nintendo’s popular home fitness game lets players choose between adventure mode, preset exercise routines, or fun mini-games. The game tracks your heart rate and calories burned and can adjust the difficulty as you progress. $54.00 from Amazon Originally $79.99 Save 32%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Far Cry 6 for Xbox The latest iteration in Ubisoft’s open-world first person shooter sets players loose on a Caribbean island to try and take down the regime of a dictator played by actor Giancarlo Esposito, from “Breaking Bad” and “The Mandalorian.” The game also supports online co-op play with another player. The game is on sale for $25 right now, which is not the lowest it's ever been, but still a great price. $12.99 from Amazon Originally $59.99 Save 78%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal NBA 2K22 for Xbox, PlayStation, Switch, PC The latest version of the popular basketball game is down to just $15 on select consoles for Prime Day. You can choose the console version you want on the retailer's listing page. $14.99 from Amazon Originally $69.99 Save 79%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Madden NFL 22 for Xbox, PlayStation 'Madden NFL 22' gets a nice discount as the NFL season passes the halfway point. Be sure to pick the console you plan to play on, as the Xbox Series and PS5 versions are more expensive. $14.99 from Best Buy Originally $59.99 Save 75%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Great Price Sony Spider-Man: Miles Morales Launch Edition (PS5) Few video game moments are as thrilling as swinging through a near-faithful rendition of New York City and in Spider-Man: Miles Morales, that's exactly what you get to do while thwarting some evil plans along the way, of course. It's one of the best games on the PS5 and an excellent deal at just $30. $29.83 from Amazon Originally $49.99 Save 40%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Xbox Game Pass for PC (3-Month Membership) Typically, you can get a 3-month Game Pass subscription for $30. Right now, it's only $25, a solid deal. This is the PC version, which gets you EA Play, exclusive member discounts, and unlimited to access to over 100 games. $24.29 from Amazon Originally $29.99 Save 19%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal PlayStation Plus Essential (12 Months) PlayStation Plus allows gamers to play online, nets them special discounts in the PlayStation Network store, and subscribers get free games each month that remain available as long as the PlayStation Plus subscription is active. Cyber Monday is an ideal times to pick up a PlayStation Plus subscription without paying full price. $59.99 from Best Buy

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Rare Deal Xbox Elite 2 Controller This high-end Xbox and PC controller has a rechargeable battery, four extra paddle buttons, and extra tools to customize its buttons. $154.99 from Microsoft Originally $179.99 Save 14%

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Limited-Time Deal Nintendo Switch Pro Controller The Pro Controller makes playing on the Switch feel more like console gaming. $20 off this controller is a solid deal. $69.99 from Best Buy

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Lowest Price Turtle Beach Recon 200 gaming headset The wired Recon 200 from Turtle Beach works for Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch, and it's a perfect entry-level gaming headset and mic. At 50% off, this is the lowest price it's been offered at. $29.99 from Best Buy Originally $59.99 Save 50%

Best Cyber Monday service deals

MasterClass 2-for-1 membership Get two MasterClass subscriptions for the price of one! Each subscription gets you access to all of MasterClass, so you can watch or sample unlimited celebrity and expert-led classes across a wide range of topics.

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal Hulu Monthly Subscription (Deal) For a limited time, Hulu is offering three months of service for $1 a month. That's 85% off the regular price. The deal ends on May 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT. $1.00 from Hulu Originally $6.99 Save 86%

Best Cyber Monday camera deals

Deal icon An icon in the shape of a lightning bolt. Deal GoPro Hero 10 Black The Hero10 Black has similar capabilities compared to many larger, more expensive cameras, while still maintaining the small, go-anywhere form-factor that GoPro is known for. Down to only $350 with a free year of the GoPro Subscription, this is an excellent deal that beats previous sales we’ve seen. $349.98 from GoPro Originally $499.99 Save 30%

When is Cyber Monday 2021?

Cyber Monday 2021 lands on November 29, which is the Monday after Thanksgiving. (Black Friday falls on November 26.) However, deals are already live at all retailers on several big-ticket products.

What tech deals will Cyber Monday offer?

Right now, we're seeing early Cyber Monday deals on video games, smartwatches, and robot vacuums among other items. It's an especially good time to get items like smart speakers, TVs, tablets, streaming players, and Apple devices for less.

What stores participate in Cyber Monday tech deals?

Pretty much any large retailer that sells electronics is taking part in early Cyber Monday festivities. Best Buy, Walmart, Amazon, and Target are the biggest players, but you can also expect equally good deals from stores like Adorama, B&H, and Microcenter.

Which has better tech deals, Black Friday or Cyber Monday?

Both holidays offer extremely rare and worthwhile deals, but Cyber Monday is better known for deals on laptops, Apple devices, headphones, gaming, and the like.

Black Friday is better known for home and kitchen appliance deals, but it does often feature excellent discounts on tech like smart speakers, TVs, smart bulbs, and tablets.

Another feature of Cyber Monday is that, as the name suggests, it's almost entirely online. Black Friday is famously shoppable both online and in-stores, sometimes with exclusive deals limited to one or the other. If you prefer shopping from the comfort of your desk chair, Cyber Monday may be the best for you.

What tech deals did we see during Cyber Monday last year?

Last year, Cyber Monday brought huge discounts on AirPods, gaming console controllers, Amazon Echo speakers, Kindle e-readers, TVs, smartwatches, robot vacuums, and much more.

How we select the best Cyber Monday tech deals
